scripts.contract:clean: bun run --cwd ./contracts sforge clean && bun run --cwd ./contracts rimraf broadcast/ cache/ out/
scripts.contract:deploy: source .env && VITE_CHAIN_ID=$VITE_CHAIN_ID bun contract:dev && DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY=$DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY bun run --cwd ./contracts sforge script script/PumpRand.s.sol --rpc-url $RPC_URL --broadcast && VITE_CHAIN_ID=$VITE_CHAIN_ID bun contract:addresses
scripts.contract:dev: bun contract:build && bun contract:iabis && bun contract:abis
scripts.contract:abis: CONTRACT=PumpRand bun contract:abi && CONTRACT=UniswapV2Factory bun contract:abi && CONTRACT=UniswapV2Router02 bun contract:abi
scripts.contract:iabis: CONTRACT=ISRC20 bun contract:iabi && CONTRACT=UniswapV2ERC20 bun contract:iabi && CONTRACT=IPumpCoin bun contract:iabi
scripts.contract:addresses: bun contract:address:pump && bun contract:address:factory && bun contract:address:dex
scripts.contract:address: jq --arg receipt "$RECEIPT" -s '{"address": .[0].receipts[($receipt | tonumber)].contractAddress} * .[1]' ./contracts/broadcast/$BROADCAST.s.sol/$VITE_CHAIN_ID/run-latest.json ./frontend/web/public/chains/$VITE_CHAIN_ID/contracts/$CONTRACT.json > temp.json && mv temp.json ./frontend/web/public/chains/$VITE_CHAIN_ID/contracts/$CONTRACT.json
